text: a karane ame isra'ilani santana mate a lakhi didhum ke je vyakti ko'ine vagara karane katala kare athava to dharati para atireka karanara hoya to jane ke tene samagra manavajatini hatya kari, ane je vyakti ko'i ekana prana bacavi le to tene jane ke samagra manavajatine jivana pradana karyum, ane te'oni pase amara ghana ja payagambaro jahera purava la'ine avya, parantu tyara pachi pana te'o manthi vadhare padata loko dharati para atyacara ane atireka karanara'o ja rahya
